definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: Have you seen what all the players who have been at Milan had to say?
sentences.chinese: 你們看到米蘭的全休球員所了些什麼嗎？

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed a complete rest of one week.

definition: leave of absence for a personal matter
official leave from work (e.g. maternity leave, sick leave or leave to attend to official business)
to delay one's work/to be late for or absent from work/loss of working time
to fail to show up for work
to take deferred time off (to make up for working during the weekend or holidays)/compensatory leave
to be absent from work or school
in the course of doing one's work/on business
part-time work in which one works each day for a half-day, typically a morning or an afternoon
to go to work/to be present (at work, school etc)/to be away on business
